Hongli Liu

hongli.liu@ualberta.ca

Education

  • PhD, Civil Engineering, University of Waterloo, Canada (2019)
  • MSc, Environmental Science, Beijing Normal University, China (2014)
  • BSc, Geography, Shandong Normal University, China (2011)

Employment

  • Assistant Professor, University of Alberta, Edmonton, Alberta, Canada (2023 - present)
  • Postdoctoral Fellow, University of Saskatchewan, Canmore, Alberta, Canada (2021-2022)
  • Postdoctoral Fellow, National Center for Atmospheric Research, Boulder, Colorado, USA (2019-2021)

Short Bio

The primary research interest of my research group is in advancing hydrologic modeling and its applications in extreme event predictions (e.g., floods and droughts) and climate change impact assessments across multiple scales.
